lead_paragraph: Four days after nearly making history at the British Open, Greg Norman labored to a four-over-par 75 in the opening round of the Senior British Open in Troon, Scotland. He finished seven shots behind the co-leaders, Bruce Vaughan and Eduardo Romero. Norman’s playing partner, Tom Watson, missed only one fairway in a bogey-free 70.
